feed.title: Seeking advice: Encouraging bug-fixing over new features

entry.title: Seeking advice: Encouraging bug-fixing over new features
entry.summary: In an email thread from 2011, Rick Wesson suggests that offering a bounty for finding the right technical lead would be more effective in improving software quality and increasing the value of Bitcoin (BTC) than offering it for finding bugs. Gavin, who is leading the effort, is mentioned as doing a good job but may not have enough time to focus on development due to other project-building efforts.
